RTCPeerConnectionSctp.summary:
The sctp read-only property of the interface returns an describing the {{Glossary("SCTP")}} transport over which SCTP data is being sent and received.
If SCTP hasn't been negotiated, this value is null.

remarks.para: The SCTP transport is used for transmitting and receiving data for any and all s on the peer connection.

RTCPeerConnectionSctp.value: A object describing the SCTP transport being used by the for transmitting and receiving on its data channels, or null if SCTP negotiation hasn't happened.
